
## Solution (only shown if `showsolutions==TRUE`){.tabset}

Here is some Code to solve the exercise.

### R {-}
This the R solution:
```{r}
x <- rnorm(10)^2
mean(x)
```

### Julia {-}
This the Julia solution:
```{julia}
x = randn(10).^2
mean(x)
```

### Python {-}
This the Python solution:
```{python}
import numpy as np
x = np.random.normal(10)
np.mean(x)
```
